question: One should not connect a number of electrical appliances to the same power socket because
option1: this can damage the appliances due to overloading
option2: this can damage the domestic wiring due to overloading
option3: this can damage the electrical meter
option4: the appliance will not get full voltage
answer: this can damage the domestic wiring due to overloading
